synthesis_conditions.notes: Synthesized by a modified method according to reference S1 with increased ratio of γ-picoline to terephthalaldehyde from 2.1 to 3.
Obtained according to references S2, S3

synthesis_conditions.washing_method: Washed with distilled water and methylene chloride
synthesis_conditions.additional_information: The pH of the solution was adjusted to 7 before adding MnCl2⋅4H2O and 1,4-bpeb.

synthesis_conditions.equipment: Low-pressure mercury lamp, OPAS XLite 380 UV LED Spot Light Source, OPAS XLite 300 Spot Light Source high-pressure mercury lamp
synthesis_conditions.notes: Powder samples were ground and irradiated. Single crystals were also irradiated at ambient temperature or low temperature (173K, 190K, 193K) with different UV sources.
